column1: Little Goat Diner////Little Goat Diner is my newest love in Chicago. It's all the commitment to flavor and distinctive ingredients of Girl and the Goat channeled into diner food. Open from 7 am until 2 am
column2: I can't wait to go here when I'm near the loop and in desperate need of food late. I've also yet to try breakfast here
column3: so eagerly looking forward to that as well. Will update this as it happens.
